Column Comment.0: UNIQUE WELL IDENTIFIER: A unique name, code or number designated as theprimary key for this row.
Column Comment.1: SOURCE: The individual, company, state, or government agency designated as thesource of information for this row.
Column Comment.2: KICKOFF POINT OBSERVATION NUMBER: Observation number identifying eachkickoff point (the KOP is where an angle buildup or a spoke begins).
Column Comment.3: SPOKE OBSERVATION NUMBER: Unique identifier for each spoke (short rangelaterals drilled from the main lateral).
Column Comment.4: ACTIVE INDICATOR: A Y/N flag indicating whether this row of data is currently eitheractive / valid (Y) or inactive / invalid (N).
Column Comment.5: EFFECTIVE DATE: The date that the data in this row first came into effect.
Column Comment.6: EXPIRY DATE: The date that the data in this row was no longer active or in effect.
Column Comment.7: LATERAL HOLE IDENTIFIER: Unique identifier assigned to each lateral hole. Alateral hole is that portion of a wellbore from kickoff point to TD.
Column Comment.8: NODE IDENTIFIER: Unique identification number assigned to a specific point (node)
Column Comment.9: ROW_MANAGEMENT_GUID: This value may be used to provide a global uniqueidentifier for this row of data. Use of this column is not mandatory, but if used,optional PPDM NOT NULL and UNIQUE INDEX constraints provided in the datamodel DDL should be created.
Column Comment.10: REMARK: Narrative remarks about this row of data.
Column Comment.11: SPOKE LENGTH: Length of the spoke drilled off a lateral (measured from the spokekickoff point to its terminus).
Column Comment.12: SPOKE LENGTH OUOM: Spoke length original unit of measure.
Column Comment.13: SPOKE TERMINUS MEASURED DEPTH: Measured depth from the surface to thespoke terminus.
Column Comment.14: SPOKE TERMINUS MEASURED DEPTH OUOM: Spoke terminus measured depthoriginal unit of measure.
Column Comment.15: SPOKE TERMINUS TRUE VERTICAL DEPTH: True vertical depth from the surfaceto the spoke terminus measured on a vertical plane (straight down).
Column Comment.16: SPOKE TERMINUS TRUE VERTICAL DEPTH OUOM: Spoke terminus true verticaldepth original unit of measure.
Column Comment.17: ROW CHANGED BY: Application login id of the user who last changed the row.
Column Comment.18: ROW CHANGED DATE: System date of the last time the row was changed.
Column Comment.19: ROW CREATED BY: System user who created this row of data.
Column Comment.20: ROW CREATED DATE: Date that the row was created on.
Column Comment.21: ROW_EFFECTIVE_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of datais effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row of data wasmade available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.22: ROW_EXPIRY_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of data isno longer effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row ofdata was no longer available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.23: PPDM ROW QUALITY: A set of values indicating the quality of data in this row,usually with reference to the method or procedures used to load the data, althoughother types of quality reference are permitted.
